page.title: 15Interview With Mrs Bird
page.content:
Debbie and I went to interview my mum. She told us all about the village and how it has changed over the years. My mum came to{Stanton School}in 1949. She told us lots about the school. Stanton School was only one class room in those days but they divided it into 2 classes. The village had only 29 houses and hardly any cars came by so they could play in the road. They did not have{electric lights}or{flush {lavatories.}Mum's first teacher was called Mrs Lucker and then Mrs Dyke. Her best{subjects}were drawing and writing essays. She liked school a bit but not a lot. They did not have the school field then, they first had the playground and it had gravel on it so it would be very hard to fall on.
By Claire Bird and Deborah Miller
